long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Time is money, start saving your life today! Kick me off is a chrome extension to help people with procrastination to save time and improve productivity by automatically shutting down websites at your choices and pop up alerts.
